评论概述: Just Ok - scratchy w short arms
评论详情: I wanted to love this but don’t. I purchased the blue which didn’t have the brightness of the photos online. It was a standard navy blue and the arms are TOO short… and yes I bought to size. They landed about 1.5 inches above my wrist and no I don’t have long or monkey arms. I should have listened to the other reviews. In addition, it is an odd soft but itchy fabric. Best description of the feel is a hybrid wool. It’s so itchy I cannot wear it. I’m not giving it a one star because it’s heavy and well stitched. Had the fabric been softer and the arm length correct, I would have loved it.

The Saodimallsu Women’s Long Cardigan Sweater is the perfect cozy layer for fall! The chunky knit is both warm and stylish, and I love the oversized, slouchy fit—it’s so comfortable and adds a trendy, effortless look to any outfit. It’s long enough to keep me warm but lightweight enough to wear over anything without feeling bulky. The open-front style makes it easy to layer over tops, tees, or even dresses. I get compliments every time I wear it, and it’s quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. Highly recommend this “coatigan” for anyone looking for a comfy and stylish fall piece!
